title: F1 engine manufacturers and FIA approve tweaks to compression ratio checks

title: Cadillac names first F1 car after Mario Andretti
summary:
Cadillac has branded its 2026 Formula 1 car the MAC-26, named after world champion and Indy 500 winner Mario Andretti.
